alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Merrick (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 02 at 4:30PM CDT until June 02 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Hamilton County in south central Nebraska... West central Merrick County in central Nebraska... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 430 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located near Marquette, or 19 miles east of Grand Island, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Law enforcement confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Central City and Marquette. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
